channel.title: Looking to make a Development team. [Read if interested]
channel.description: Hello fellow reader Ok so basically i am making a development team for [u][b]Revision 718/742[/b][/u]. I need a decent coder that could potentially pay for a vps early on I have everything set-up. ( Website, webclient and of course the actual game itself) If you're interested please add my [b]Skype: saintrawr[/b] Once added upon adding me [b]include[/b] the following template below- [b]Why i should choose you: Age? Timezone? Experience? Can you buy the vps? Good with websites? Good with remaking models? On a scale of 1-10, how mature are you?[/b]

item.title: Looking to make a Development team. [Read if interested]
